is_service.description: Specifies whether or not the user is a service account.

username.description: The username associated with this resource.

block.description: Provides information about existing users.

description.description: The description of this variable.

id.description: The identifier of the variable to find.

is_editable.description: Indicates whether or not this variable is considered editable.

is_sensitive.description: Indicates whether or not this resource is considered sensitive and should be kept secret.

name.description: The name of variable to find.

owner_id.description: Owner ID for the variable to find.

description.description: The description of this variable prompt option.

control_type.description: The type of control for rendering this prompted variable. Valid types are `SingleLineText`, `MultiLineText`, `Checkbox`, `Select`.

display_name.description: The display name for the select value

select_option.description: If the `control_type` is `Select`, then this value defines an option.

actions.description: A list of actions that are scoped to this variable value.

channels.description: A list of channels that are scoped to this variable value.

environments.description: A list of environments that are scoped to this variable value.

machines.description: A list of machines that are scoped to this variable value.

processes.description: A list of processes that are scoped to this variable value.

roles.description: A list of roles that are scoped to this variable value.

tenant_tags.description: A list of tenant tags that are scoped to this variable value.

scope.description: As variable names can appear more than once under different scopes, a VariableScope must also be provided

space_id.description: The space ID associated with this variable.

type.description: The type of variable represented by this resource. Valid types are `AmazonWebServicesAccount`, `AzureAccount`, `GoogleCloudAccount`, `UsernamePasswordAccount`, `Certificate`, `Sensitive`, `String`, `WorkerPool`.

block.description: Provides information about existing variables.

skip.description: A filter to specify the number of items to skip in the response.

take.description: A filter to specify the number of items to take (or return) in the response.

worker_pools.description: A list of worker pools that match the filter(s).

block.description: Provides information about existing worker pools.
